name: Sovol SV08 MAX 0.4 nozzle
machine_start_gcode:
G28
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ;set bed temp
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ;wait for bed temp
START_PRINT
G90
G1 X0 Y0 F12000
G1 Z0.300 F600
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ;set extruder temp
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer];wait for extruder temp
{if first_layer_print_min[0] - 3 > print_bed_min[0]}
G90
M83
G1 E-0.100 F600
G1 X{first_layer_print_min[0] - 3} Y{first_layer_print_min[1]} F12000
G1 Z0.3 F600 ;Move to start position
G1 E0.100 F600
G1 Y{first_layer_print_min[1] + 5 * 6} E{5 * 0.24 * 6}  F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 5 * 30}
G1 Y{first_layer_print_min[1] + 5 * 6 * 2} E{5 * 0.16 * 6}  F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 5 * 30}
G1 E-0.100 F600
G1 Z1 F600
G1 X{first_layer_print_min[0] - 2} Y{first_layer_print_min[1]} F12000
G1 Z0.3 F600 ;Move to start position
G1 E0.100 F600
G1 Y{first_layer_print_min[1] + 5 * 6} E{5 * 0.24 * 6}  F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 5 * 30}
G1 Y{first_layer_print_min[1] + 5 * 6 * 2} E{5 * 0.16 * 6}  F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 5 * 30}
G1 E-0.100 F600
{else}
G90
M83
G1 E-0.100 Z3 F600
G1 X-1.5 Y{first_layer_print_min[1]} F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 5 * 30}
G1 Z0.3 F600
G1 E0.100 F600
G1 Y{first_layer_print_min[1] + 5 * 6} E{5 * 0.24 * 6}  F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 5 * 30}
G1 Y{first_layer_print_min[1] + 5 * 6 * 2} E{5 * 0.16 * 6}  F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 5 * 30}
G1 X-0.5 Y{first_layer_print_min[1]} F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 5 * 30}
G1 Z0.3 F600
G1 E0.100 F600
G1 Y{first_layer_print_min[1] + 5 * 6} E{5 * 0.24 * 6}  F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 5 * 30}
G1 Y{first_layer_print_min[1] + 5 * 6 * 2} E{5 * 0.16 * 6}  F{outer_wall_volumetric_speed * 5 * 30}
G1 E-0.100 Z3 F600
M400
{endif}
SET_PRINT_STATS_INFO TOTAL_LAYER=[total_layer_count]
